website_summaries.verdict: Crisp, clear sound from a well-known brand, but not ideal for high volumes.
pros: Especially gives extra clarity during dialogue
Super tweeter is specifically designed to deliver high-frequency audio response
cons: There is some distortion at loud volumes

customer_reviews.title: Good for an entry level center speaker but doesn't match the SSCS5 much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to complement the SSCS5's that I love. The highs are replicated well but the mid and low range suffer from the smaller 4" woofers. They really should of matched the SSCS5's 5.25 inch woofers. I was watching Captain America: Civil War and noticed how all the voices of the male actors sounded hollow - similar to the sound of a cell phone's speakers. I've done listening tests on music and can notice the difference between the two pretty easily. I'm at a loss whether or not to keep these. I expected the speaker set to coordinate better but then again, it's hard to get high quality at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Injuis

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the Sony Core series towers for my sunroom. They are powered by a Yamaha 7.2 Receiver (105X7 RMS) and a SVS SB-2000 subwoofer. With this set-up, voices are crystal clear with depth and all around great dynamic range. Both movies and music sound great. Great product by Sony! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: dependable sony quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker on sale . So the value is outstanding. The 4" woofers do go low and blend with the Sony 5" bookshelfs and 10" woofer. All mica cones. I am using an older Sherwood 5.1 with no EQ. and Wharfedale surrounds. The detail and smoothness is impressive. Makes Klipsch sound very harsh. Ordered a ribbon to extend range a bit . But very satisfied with purchase, price and power handling of this Sony model
customer_reviews.author: ericn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for Money.
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Sony speakers and this is a wonderful center speaker for the price range. I replaced a very similar KLH center speaker and the improvement in clarity was immediately noticeable. I was able to drop my listening volume by a good 7 db and follow the dialog on TV with similar ease as before. I now have a 5.1 set of these Sony speakers and I have to say that at the price point I am totally satisfied. I think only audiophiles are going to notice the difference between these and much more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence or Christine Dol

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: I replaced another Sony speaker because the black went better in the room than the old grey one but the sound quality of this one is not near as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Please Don’t buy anything from this seller. He doesn’t put actual information about product conditions. Recently I bought this product from this seller but the item is total garbage ( repaired but not quality repairs)
customer_reviews.author: Nahid Hasan

customer_reviews.title: It's very clear and sounds surprisingly good on its own
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the center channel that had come with an economy receiver, and it's a HUGE improvement! It's very clear and sounds surprisingly good on its own. Dialog in TV shows and movies sounds great, and it handles music very well too. It's quite a bit larger than I expected (really the depth) but still a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for family room setup
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for family room setup. nice midrange and full sounding audio. Used this with the following setup: Samsung UN60KS8000 TV Sony STRDH770 Receiver Amp Sony SSCS5 Left/Right Bookshelf Speakers Sony SSCS8 Center Speaker Sony Amp used HDMI ARC to the TV, works and sounds great! Replaced a failed attempt with sound bar (VIZIO SB4551-D5). Audio quality was pitiful.
customer_reviews.author: ms909698

customer_reviews.title: Great sound on a budget
customer_reviews.text: great sound, better than I was expecting. The price I think it's fair for the quality. I got them actually at half off so took advantage of the offer. If you are looking for an upgrade and are on a budget you will not be disappointed. The speaker is a bit in the bulky side but doesnt feel cheap like others
customer_reviews.author: HAROLD A. RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Center Channel Speaker
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great speaker. The unit is a bit large, so check dimensions before you purchase. The sound quality is clear and pairs well with the Sony SSCS-5 bookshelf speakers. The unit itself is well built. Dialogue is clear and music also sounds good with it.
customer_reviews.author: A Typical User

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: Solid center channel, won't blow your socks off, but it sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with the book shielf and floor standing tower in the same series ran through a new Denon AVR X2400H receiver, very excellent sound, great surround sound speaker system, very happy with these speaker.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome center speaker for home theater
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one the best center speakers out there. I am an old Sony fan and anyone that has Sony products knows they will never be disappointed. This particular speaker is crystal clear and works fabulously in my home theater. Highly recommend! 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Willie Fistergash

customer_reviews.title: It is a SONY!
customer_reviews.text: I got it on prime day for $73. A great buy. Sound quality is comparable to those within $200 range.

customer_reviews.title: powerful center channel speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent center channel speaker for a "heavy" home theater system..using old school large speakers and a hefty amp...I'm happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.text: I did not like the sound quality, it was to hight frequency. I assume it's because of the woofers are only 4"

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound. Best speaker for the money.
customer_reviews.text: SSCS8 works well with my Denon receiver. Sound quality is perfect. Very happy with this speaker and the price. Well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for center sound
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected. Provides great center channel sound no matter what size room.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. Covers the voice spectrum well. I recommend for the price.

customer_reviews.title: My husband is very happy with the speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker really helps us hear dialogue without having to turn the volume up and down throughout the movie. My husband is very happy with the speaker, and he is the tech person in our family.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker offers clear dialogue and sound. Sounds very good.

customer_reviews.text: This is a beast of a speaker. Very satisfied with this purchase.

customer_reviews.text: This Sony Center-channel Speaker set does a great job of rounding out the sound in our media room.

customer_reviews.title: Overall sounds great and makes movies much more enjoyable as I can ...
customer_reviews.text: LOUD and CLEAR is all that one could ask for. Some distortion if the amp is turned too high but at that point the music is too LOUD, lol. Overall sounds great and makes movies much more enjoyable as I can now hear voice clearly. This is set up with 5 speaker Bose system as the center speaker...
customer_reviews.author: SLJR

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is sweet... I used it for my center speaker for my 7.2 receiver, and after a recalibration for the room it provides excellent sound. The dialogue is crisp and vocals are spectacular from it at low and hi volumes.
customer_reviews.author: W. Burn

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I have this along with the matching bookshelf speakers. These don't have the super tweeter as the bookshelves do but it does share the same main tweeter. As with the bookshelves I'm very satisfied with performance. Vocals are very intelligible both on and off axis. As with the bookshelves I think these are keepers for a long time, bravo Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Burgner

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Clean and clear as possible. I truly love this speaker.The price is off the charts for such quality. Speakers 3 or 4 times as much aren't gonna touch it!
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: Midrange speaker at a midrange price but it gave my ...
customer_reviews.text: Midrange speaker at a midrange price but it gave my system a little ooph in the midrange, just where I wanted it. To my ear, it makes voices more distinct.

customer_reviews.text: Sounds absolutely wonderful. Crisp and clean. A very good center speaker for the money.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great speaker. I really do wish it was able ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great speaker. I really do wish it was able to handle more power than it's rated for. Though, it gets the job done nicely and has great range to it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetically damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received this speaker today. Sounds great, but was damaged (I assume damaged during shipping). I'm going to return and purchase a new one. If it looks better and sounds the same, I'll update my review.... **Update: I returned the speaker for a refund but now the sale under which I purchased it is over and Amazon won't honor the original price. Do yourself a favor and go to Best Buy....
